Times change, bodies are needed. I've personally witnessed this latest "Fad" in my Squadron. I've seen over ten soldiers lose rank over PT. It is not "legal" per se, per the regs. You are supposed to be processed out. Instead you are charged with failure to perform, and demoted under those auspices. No one really raises a ruckus. In the old days they'd just boot you out. Alot of troops have tried failing PT tests purposefully in order to get out, and out of deploying. So now they just reduce you.
